PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_ConstructionResource
PropertySetDef.Definition: Properties for tracking resource usage over time.

PropertyDef.Name: ScheduleWorkProgression
PropertyDef.Definition: The scheduled work on behalf of the resource allocation.

PropertyDef.Name: ActualWorkTime
PropertyDef.Definition: The actual work on behalf of the resource allocation.

PropertyDef.Name: RemainingWorkProgression
PropertyDef.Definition: The remaining work on behalf of the resource allocation.

PropertyDef.Name: ScheduleCost
PropertyDef.Definition: The budgeted cost on behalf of the resource allocation.

PropertyDef.Name: ActualCost
PropertyDef.Definition: The actual cost on behalf of the resource allocation.

PropertyDef.Name: RemainingCost
PropertyDef.Definition: The remaining cost on behalf of the resource allocation.

PropertyDef.Name: ScheduleCompletion
PropertyDef.Definition: The scheduled completion percentage of the allocation.

PropertyDef.Name: ActualCompletion
PropertyDef.Definition: The actual completion percentage of the allocation.
